value:
$WmMPID_マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Normal,Face|Defeated by a cursed sword...
What a child I was.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... Do I— Hmmm...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Something on your mind, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Have we...met somewhere before,
Peony? Something about you is just
so familiar somehow...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|O-oh! Really? Wh-where would
we have met before? $k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... I guess I don't know.$k$p$EFace|But deep down, I feel as though
I know you. Why would that be?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ah... Maybe from your dreams?$k$pYoung, innocent children laugh and
play with us ljósálfar as they dream.
Perhaps that's it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Now that I hear you say it...
that must be it.$k$pTo think I would remember dreams
from so long ago... But I still wish
I could remember more!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Whether you remember or not, we
are BOUND to get along splendidly!
That's what I think, at least.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, I agree! With us together, our
friends will have a tough time NOT
seeing the bright side of things.$k$pThat's right! ...Well, since I can't
remember meeting you before...
I'm glad to meet you now, Peony!$k$pLet's be friends! All right?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I-I'd...love to be your friend,
Sharena! Thank you.$k$p$Sbs150|
